test_message: Message received: Your HDFC account will be blocked in 24 hours due to KYC expiry. Click this link to update: hdfc-kyc-update.site/verify or call our customer care at 9876543210. Send Rs 1 to verify.upi@oksbi to confirm your account is active.
expected_purpose: Scam pattern matching with knowledge base

matched_patterns.pattern_name: UPI fraud through fake payment request
